Shop Floor & Production

The shop floor is a tough environment - with heavy machinery, high levels of vibration and increasingly sophisticated software solutions bringing everything together.

Challenge

Aside from environmental factors, the shop floor also serves as the crossroads for a number of other areas including material routing, inventory management, part availability and workforce scheduling.

Solution

Getac devices are rugged enough to stand up to any environment - including your shop floor. They have a range of key benefits that make running a shop floor easier, smoother and more intelligent:

  1. Mobile performance monitoring for real-time production tracking.
  2. Integration with WMS software for seamless interoperability.
  3. Easy to read screens and ease of use for data capture in extreme environments.

Benefits

Leading industrial manufacturers trust Getac to provide quality devices that blend rugged hardware with optimized software for the challenges of the shop floor.

  1. Getac products are inherently rugged and built to survive in the harshest conditions.
  2. We give you comprehensive field engineering support for areas including system integration and compatibility testing, development of docking solutions, software imaging, and aftersales support
  3. Our products are trusted by leading global manufacturers.
  4. Get the industry-best warranty for a minimum of three years, including accidental damage.

Quality Control

Smooth manufacturing operations rely on efficient machinery and processes. Over 550 Automotive manufacturing plants around the world, representing 60 brands from 14 global companies - all of which are looking to take advantage of Industry 4.0 technology to gain an efficiency edge, reduce costs and enhance customer satisfaction.

Challenge

Quality control systems are full of variables - whether it's Six Sigma, TQM or Lean Production – but these variables like failure analysis, acceptance tests, technical inspections, certification and pre-assembly parts inspection can be digitized.

To digitize effectively you need a solution that:

  1. Can handle huge amounts of data.
  2. Have built-rugged mobile operations.
  3. Can record past failures, analysis of root cause and suggest corrective action implementation.
  4. Delivers smooth, seamless running across multiple team members in real-time.

Solution

Getac's rugged mobile hardware and seamless software can become the beating heart of your quality control operation.

Our devices are trusted by leading manufacturers to:

  1. Integrate seamlessly with your current ERP software.
  2. Stand up to tough shop floor environments with built-rugged construction.
  3. Capture all inputs from multiple users that are then available on all inter-connected mobile devices.

Benefits

Leading industrial manufacturers trust Getac to provide quality control solutions that blend rugged hardware with optimized software.

  1. Getac products are inherently rugged and built to survive in all weather conditions.
  2. We give you comprehensive field engineering support for areas including system integration and compatibility testing, development of docking solutions, software imaging, and aftersales support.
  3. Our products are trusted by leading global manufacturers.
  4. We give you the industry-best warranty for a minimum of three years, including accidental damage.

Asset Management & Maintenance

When you own several expensive, complicated assets it's essential to maximize their benefits through a combination of the right hardware and interconnected software to secure the best ROI.

Challenge

The manufacturing environment presents a number of challenges to managers and operators.

  1. Limited connectivity restricts remote access support.
  2. Unstable network connectivity can interrupt asset management and make it difficult to provide the remote support required.
  3. Poor battery performance of devices can cause downtime and loss of productivity.
  4. Harsh environments mean you need specialist, rugged devices.

Solution

Getac's rugged devices and seamless, easily integrated software connect to how your manufacturing facility works now - finding ways to improve asset management workflows and increase productivity.

  1. Perform predictive maintenance to reduce asset downtime.
  2. Gather real-time data to identify events that may cause issues in the future.
  3. Use built-rugged devices that stand up to the factory environment.
  4. Dual battery capability can last a whole shift and beyond - reducing device downtime.

Benefits

Leading industrial manufacturers trust Getac to provide quality devices that blend rugged hardware with optimized software for performing asset management and maintenance tasks.

  1. Getac products are inherently rugged and built to survive in all weather conditions.
  2. We give you comprehensive field engineering support for areas including system integration and compatibility testing, development of docking solutions, software imaging, and aftersales support.
  3. Our products are trusted by leading global manufacturers.
  4. We give you the industry-best warranty for a minimum of three years, including accidental damage.

Delivery & Transport

The delivery and transportation of goods is subject to rigorous standards that must be met. Aside from these demands, a paper-based workflow can cause poor visibility across your supply chain.

Challenge

Transport and logistics has a unique set of challenges that must be overcome in order to keep customers satisfied, deliveries on track and efficient operations on the road.

  1. Manual paperwork creates blind spots and potential for lost or damaged documents.
  2. Delivery times are becoming tighter, with customers expecting goods in fast shipments.
  3. Fraud and theft continues to be an issue, with disconnected systems creating opportunities for those with bad intentions.

Solution

Getac Automotive's seamlessly connected software solutions are delivered on our famed built-rugged devices, ensuring that there is no task too tough that can't be accomplished.

  1. Increase efficiency, identify opportunities for consolidation and cost reduction with our intelligent software.
  2. Optimize driver route planning.
  3. Get a single platform that connects with your existing systems for ease of operations and device familiarity across your workforce.
  4. Gather data in real-time and have it available across devices for multiple workers and touchpoints.

Benefits

Leading industrial manufacturers trust Getac to provide quality devices that blend rugged hardware with optimized software for transport and delivery.

  1. Getac products are inherently rugged and built to survive in all weather conditions.
  2. We give you comprehensive field engineering support for areas including system integration and compatibility testing, development of docking solutions, software imaging, and aftersales support.
  3. Our products are trusted by leading global manufacturers.
  4. We give you the industry-best warranty for a minimum of three years, including accidental damage.
